alert.note: Alert for Allen; Barren; Edmonson; Grayson; Hart; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Simpson, Hart, Allen, southeastern Grayson, central Warren, northwestern Barren and Edmonson Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Leitchfield to 6 miles northwest of Portland. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of Hart, southeastern Grayson, central Warren, southeastern Simpson, Allen, Edmonson and northwestern Barren Counties, including the following locations... Black Jack, Girkin, Cub Run, Logsdon Valley, Broad Ford, Greenhill, Settle, Alonzo, Mammoth Cave and Priceville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central and central Kentucky.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Barren; Edmonson; Grayson; Hart; Simpson; Warren
